languages.text: Allies under the effects of {g|f:6fdddfc22c7145e5bda65b5c96e28c3e}Trenchline Stratagem{/g} will {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g} without movement and are immune to all types of forced movement.
languages.original_text: Союзники под действием стратагемы: защита {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклоняются{/g} от {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}атак по области{/g} без движения и получают иммунитет к любому принудительному перемещению.

traits.locale_text: Allies under the effects of Trenchline Stratagem will dodge area attacks without movement and immune to all types of forced movement.

languages.text: 所有受{g|f:6fdddfc22c7145e5bda65b5c96e28c3e}战壕战略{/g}影响的盟友可以在无需移动的情况下{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}范围攻击{/g}，同时免疫所有强制移动效果。
languages.original_text: Allies under the effects of {g|f:6fdddfc22c7145e5bda65b5c96e28c3e}Trenchline Stratagem{/g} will {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g} without movement and are immune to all types of forced movement.

traits.locale_text: 所有受战壕战略影响的盟友可以在无需移动的情况下{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}闪避{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}范围攻击{/g}，同时免疫所有强制移动效果。

languages.text: Los aliados que estén bajo los efectos de {g|f:6fdddfc22c7145e5bda65b5c96e28c3e}Estratagema de atrincheramiento{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquivan{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}ataques de área{/g} sin tener que moverse y se vuelven inmunes a todos los tipos de movimiento obligado.
languages.original_text: Allies under the effects of {g|f:6fdddfc22c7145e5bda65b5c96e28c3e}Trenchline Stratagem{/g} will {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g} without movement and are immune to all types of forced movement.

traits.locale_text: Los aliados que estén bajo los efectos de Estratagema de atrincheramiento {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}esquivan{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}ataques de área{/g} sin tener que moverse y se vuelven inmunes a todos los tipos de movimiento obligado.

languages.text: Verbündete unter den Effekten des {g|f:6fdddfc22c7145e5bda65b5c96e28c3e}Grabenlinie-Strategems{/g}ist das bewegungslose {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}Ausweichen{/g} von {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}Flächenangriffen{/g} möglich. Außerdem sind sie immun gegen sämtliche Arten von erzwungenen Bewegungen.
languages.original_text: Allies under the effects of {g|f:6fdddfc22c7145e5bda65b5c96e28c3e}Trenchline Stratagem{/g} will {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g} without movement and are immune to all types of forced movement.

traits.locale_text: Verbündete unter den Effekten des Grabenlinie-Strategems ist das bewegungslose {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}Ausweichen{/g} von {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}Flächenangriffen{/g} möglich. Außerdem sind sie immun gegen sämtliche Arten von erzwungenen Bewegungen.

languages.text: Les alliés sous l'effet du {g|f:6fdddfc22c7145e5bda65b5c96e28c3e}stratagème Tranchée{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquivent{/g} les {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}attaques de zone{/g} sans se déplacer et sont invulnérables à tous les types de déplacements forcés.
languages.original_text: Allies under the effects of {g|f:6fdddfc22c7145e5bda65b5c96e28c3e}Trenchline Stratagem{/g} will {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g} without movement and are immune to all types of forced movement.

traits.locale_text: Les alliés sous l'effet du Stratagème Ligne de Tranchée {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}esquivent{/g} les {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}attaques de zones{/g} sans se déplacer et sont invulnérables à tous les types de déplacements forcés.

languages.text: 塹壕計略の効果を受けている味方は、移動することなく{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}範囲攻撃{/g}を{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}でき、あらゆる強制移動を無効化する。
languages.original_text: Allies under the effects of Trenchline Stratagem will {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g} without movement and are immune to all types of forced movement.

traits.locale_text: 塹壕計略の効果を受けている味方は、移動することなく{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}範囲攻撃{/g}を{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}でき、あらゆる強制移動を無効化する。

languages.text: {g|f:6fdddfc22c7145e5bda65b5c96e28c3e}Hendek Hattı Savaş Hilesi{/g} etkisi altında bulunan dost birimler, {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}alan saldırılarından{/g} hareket etmeden {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}kaçınırlar{/g} ve her türlü zorunlu hareket etkisine karşı bağışıklık kazanırlar.
